Key Match Events: The Lakers were awarded possession after an out of bounds call, which was later ruled as a missed call by the NBA.
Post-Match Reflections: The Pelicans had an opportunity to attempt a game-tying three on their final possession, but turned the ball over which gave possession back to the Lakers and ultimately sealed the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday night, making it five-straight wins.
For New Orleans, the loss was its 10th on the season, which is the most in the Western Conference.
